name: Chicken Nest - UE4 Student Project
description:
This is a Student Project for my first semester at Margmiðlunarskólinn in Iceland.
This game is Completely free. Any donations are appreciated.

PC Controls:
W A S D = Move 
Spacebar = Jump
F = Pause (Freeze game)
E = First person view
Scroll Wheel = Zoom in / Zoom out
Right Click = Reset view angle

Gamepad Controls:
Left Joystick: Move
A = Jump
Start = Pause
B = First person view
L+R Triggers / Y = Zoom in / Zoom out
X = Reset view angle

Ctrl+Alt+Delete = Quit game (sorry I forgot)
